name: Aarakocra
description: Sequestered in high mountains atop tall trees, the Aarakocra, sometimes called birdfolk, evoke fear and wonder. Many Aarakocra aren’t even native to the Material Plane. They hail from a world beyond—from the boundless vistas of the Elemental Plane of Air. They have slender, avian bodies with wings instead of arms, and their legs are more suited for perching than walking. Their feathers can be various colors, but they are most commonly white, grey, or brown.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Aarakocra, and Auran.
special: Flight: You have a flying speed of 50 feet. To use this speed, you can’t be wearing medium or heavy armor.
